TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1050-1051
TEI.2.document_title: Kinchen Holliman to Stephen F. Austin, 02-21-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Kinchen Holliman to Austin, Woodville, Miss., February 21, 1825. Hard times delay his moving to Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1050-1051

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Kinchen Holliman to Austin, Woodville, Miss., February 21, 1825. Hard times delay his moving to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Woodville state of Mississippi Wilkerson County*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-21-1825">Feby 21- 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*In consequence of the failure of our corn and the want of money it has put it out of my power to go to your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* as soon as I promised you, and cannot possibly go now until the Month of *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1825">November next*/date_mentioned*—I am sorry to tell you that it is out of my power to send you any money at this time, but will endeavor to do so by the time my *person_mentioned*Brother Michael*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. H. Connell*/person_mentioned* goes over which will be in *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1825">*location_mentioned*June next*/location_mentioned**/date_mentioned*, they are determined to go and have set the *date_mentioned n="06-01-1825">first of June*/date_mentioned* to start, The bearer *person_mentioned*Mr. Lawrence Ramey*/person_mentioned* my friend will give you all the necessary information respecting my intentions etc.*/p*
*p*Be so good as to continue to hold the land you promised me for *person_mentioned*Brother Michael*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Hugh Connell*/person_mentioned* until they arrive *person_mentioned*Mr. Ramey*/person_mentioned* will leave here in two or three days for the purpose of procuring his and for other purposes and will go with *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* by the way of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*K Holliman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Oustin Esq*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
